questions.question: 1. In structural engineering, the slope deflection method is primarily used for analyzing?

explanations.b: The slope deflection method is primarily used for analyzing the indeterminate structures

questions.question: 2. What are unknown displacements for a non-sway frame?

explanations.a: Translations are unknown displacements for a non-sway frame here

questions.question: 3.What are the unknown values assigned at the ends of each member in the slope deflection method?

explanations.c: Displacements and Rotations are assigned at the ends of each member in the slope deflection method

questions.question: 4. Which of the following shall be a non-sway frame?

answers.c: Symmetrical frame under both horizontal & vertical loads

explanations.b: A non-sway frame Symmetrical frame under vertical loads
The slope deflection method is analytical technique
